dialog.line: Ooooooooh...?
Ya'see?
That's probably how them losers will react, when they'll look upon you.
Of course, boyo, put yourself in their shoes : they're going here on holidays.
They're usually doing some "important" things, during their "honests" careers.
Human brain is entirely jammed by desperation, city rumble, capitalism...
They're a bit stretched, ya'know.
So, by looking upon a lil boyo like ya...
Crimson skinned...
Smily and armless!
Nanananana... ma boi, I'm suspecting the human panic attack!
Hey, out of context, glad to meet you, I'm Topo.
And you... ya name is...?
Not-the-talkative-type.
That's odd, but, my point is your feet are sounding neat!
And your legs, maboi, so nice!
Let's assume that your name is Plip Plop
I'm bored here. Lone and bored, eh.
So... ya'll be so nice to catch up on family's news, ya'd be so cool.
Do it your way, stomp it, don't know.
That's easy : we're four Mwi Mwi on the island!
Me, Ani, Tum and Taka.
Feel free to come back to me, when you'll be done with them.
They are experts in tourists issues...
Find'em some answers, and I'll give ya some niiiiiice present.
Promise!
Hey hum... that won't be a video game, eh. You're way too young for that human folly.
You come to say "hello", peep?
Like it.
Here, nothing new, the old story, haha.
May believe that night never comes, hehe.
Or else, waves are still waving, and sun is... "sunning", ya'see.
Don't mind my gobbledygook.
You have more interesting to do, no doubt.
Crash holidays, ruin the fun...
Heiiiii!
You're starting to rock!!
Don't forget, once the whole family is happy...
Come at me!
The amazing present is waiting for ya...
Sure, you'll love it!
No joke, you are the proper family boi.
One more cousin to help and...
No, no, no spoil. I won't break down.
I can tell ya that, on the end, the boat sinks or maybe, the bad guy takes up the stones and finger snaps.
But for the end of OUR story... nothing.
I'm persisting, quiet as the... the rock.
YOU DID IT!

line.small: I can't believe it, I'm gonna say it another time.

dialog.line: Take it, you clearly won it.
Consider yourself as the FAMILY BOYO WE LOVE!
You are the best!
